body_html:
I don't have access to the exact same device than in October 2017 anymore, but, using the same GPU model and pytorch 0.4.0a0+363de58, I now get:

No BN and no lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 11
No BN and with lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 34
With BN and no lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 12
With BN and with lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 64

Thank you so much for the speed up!

body:
I don't have access to the exact same device than in October 2017 anymore, but, using the same GPU model and pytorch 0.4.0a0+363de58, I now get:
```
No BN and no lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 11
No BN and with lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 34
With BN and no lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 12
With BN and with lambda
epoch  0 loss 2.30 time 64
```
Thank you so much for the speed up!
